title: mach
subtitle: A flight simulation tool that allows you to retrieve information from brazilian flights in a very intuitive way.
description: Front-end built with React and TailwindCSS. Back-end implemented as a REST API built with NodeJS, ExpressJS and Sequelize. CI/CD implemented using GitHub Actions.

title: ivao-whazzup
subtitle: A JavaScript wrapper for IVAO's Whazzup API.
description: Built with TypeScript as an exercise for TDD with Jest. Automatic versioning and deploy to NPM registry using Semantic Versioning and GitHub Actions.
